title: collinscoinz
author: collinscoinz
content: Yes indeed i was introduced to this great forum by a friend and i also want to know what some one that is new will learn in this place,is copy work like some post accepted,sparming are this well come,will my acct be barn for this want to know so that let me know what am doing too,and again how can one start trading on bitcoin,how do i start please,

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This is meta: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=24.0This is beginners and help: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=39.0Start to read the sticky threads on both meta and beginners and help. Read the rules, spamming is not accepted. But I am wondering that someone can ask if spamming is accepted or not, spamming is what every forum do not accept, it can only lead to ban and it would be a permaban.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Quote from: collinscoinz on March 09, 2023, 07:27:33 AMis copy work like some post accepted,sparming are this well come,will my acct be barnStrictly no plagiarism and spamming or else you'll get BANNED. - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0Quote from: collinscoinz on March 09, 2023, 07:27:33 AMhow can one start trading on bitcoin,how do i start please,Start learning what kind of space you are getting into instead rather than jumping into trading right away - https://learnmeabitcoin.com/. You can't just expect to learn trading without knowing the basic stuff first or else it'll make things difficult for you in the long run.

comments.author: Kalam001
comments.body: You are welcome to the forum, have it at the back of your mind that you are here to learn not to fraud or commit anything illegal act. I urge and advise you to follow the rules and regulations of the forum and feel free to ask for guidance if you find anything difficult. You are welcome once again...

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: It depends what your real goal is.Looking at your preferences it seems pretty random, let's say you want to trade but you've never been on trading discussion boards. Likewise your other intentions, I have never even found a forum that allows users to spam. I think you should read more first than write something.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Month ago you basically asked the the same thing and you got some very good answers so I suggest for start to go back to that one and read it again.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: collinscoinz on March 09, 2023, 07:27:33 AMYes indeed i was introduced to this great forum by a friend and i also want to know what some one that is new will learn in this place,is copy work like some post accepted,sparming are this well come,will my acct be barn for this want to know so that let me know what am doing too,and again how can one start trading on bitcoin,how do i start please,What can be achieved basically depends on your motive for being here; if you are here to learn knowledge, that can be achieved; if you are here for airdrops and bounty pinots and some kinds of funding, that can be achieved. You can learn and earn on this forum; it all depends on you.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: As a new user here you can gain knowledge and apply that knowledge to your investment plans and financial activities.Quote from: nakamura12 on March 09, 2023, 07:44:01 AMOne thing that is important that you should do is to follow the rules or should I say never break the forum rules even though it is unofficial The forum rules are official alright, what's unofficial is the compilation of the list, you can see that from the topic title;"Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ"

comments.author: CoolBoybd
comments.body: If you are a newbie then you should learn about crypto from this forum. You can learn also from crypto related YouTube channels. In this forum you can learn about Cryptocurrencies, about trading, about market analysis. If you want to know about start trading in Bitcoin then I will say you should be a holder of Btc and don't trade daily as you are a beginner.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: As a new member, one of the priorities for you is to learn and learn more because you cannot focus all your education on trading and neglect to see the rest of the much more important elements such as safeguards and how to identify scammy projects and scammers. You should also review the forum rules and systems used by the community, such as the trust system or the membership system. This will make it easier for you to reach your goals in the best possible way, and you may like staying with us.Quote from: Rikafip on March 09, 2023, 09:31:33 AMMonth ago you basically asked the the same thing and you got some very good answers so I suggest for start to go back to that one and read it again.He has very bad English and I suspect he is re-posting the same thoughts on more than one topic in an attempt to get some merit points. I noticed a long time ago that many people do this.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: Quote from: collinscoinz on March 09, 2023, 07:27:33 AMYes indeed i was introduced to this great forum by a friend and i also want to know what some one that is new will learn in this place,is copy work like some post accepted,sparming are this well come,will my acct be barn for this want to know so that let me know what am doing too,and again how can one start trading on bitcoin,how do i start please,I’m sure your friend told you plagiarism/copy and paste without reference to the original source is prohibited here, and like most newbies you probably think it’s not that serious hence your question.  The punishment for plagiarism is permanent ban from the forum. You would want to rethink that because you will be caught, it may not be immediate but surely the forum has a way of paying you what you sow.I think you should post question like this in your local board. There are people there who will gladly help you and direct you how to go.
